entries.meaning: The percentage or amount by which a seller hikes up his buy-in price when determining his selling price.
examples: You don’t make much money selling gas because the markup is so low.
There will be a markup on those products next week; better buy them now.

entries.meaning: (computing) The notation that is used to indicate the meaning of the elements in an electronic document, or to dictate how text should be displayed.
examples: You can display the icon on any site you offer your software for download using the following markup…

entries.meaning: (US politics) The process by which proposed legislation is debated and amended.
